Boot to Character Select Screen
- Does not skip loading memory card data.
This mod can be modified to go to other screens by modifying the last byte with a different ID.
A list of different menu IDs can be found here: http://tinyurl.com/Menu-ID-Notes
[Dan Salvato, achilles]
Version -- DOL Offset ------ Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code
1.00 ------ 0x1BB794 ---- 887F0004 -> 38600002 ---- (lbz r3,4(r31) -> li r0,2)
1.02 ------ 0x1BC600 ---- 887F0004 -> 38600002 ---- (lbz r3,4(r31) -> li r0,2)
PAL ------- 0x1BE160 ---- 887F0004 -> 38600002 ---- (lbz r3,4(r31) -> li r0,2)


	-==-


CSS B Button Return Cursor Fix
- works for all characters
[Achilles]
Version -- DOL Offset ------ Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code
1.02 ----- 0x8025FE50 --- 4080022C -> Branch

387E00C1 38C00000
38C60001 2C060020
41820014 8D03001C
7C082000 41820018
4BFFFFE8 3C608026
6063007C 7C6903A6
4E800420 48000000


	-==-


Hold Start to Force Load CSS
- hold for two seconds
- only works in multiplayer mode
[Achilles]
Version -- DOL Offset ------ Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code
1.02 ----- 0x80262614 --- BA6100B4 -> Branch

3C60801A 60634340
7C6803A6 3C608048
88639D30 4E800021
2C030001 4182008C
3C608043 60632087
38800006 7C8903A6
38A00000 8C830008
2C040021 41820008
38A50001 4200FFF0
2C050000 4182005C
38ADB4EF 38800004
7C8903A6 8C850001
2C04003C 41800040
3C808046 8884BF12
2C040001 40820024
38600000 98650000
3C608002 60634030
7C6803A6 38600003
4E800021 48000014
38600001 986DB656
48000008 4200FFB8
BA6100B4 48000000


	-==-


MnSlChr File Patch Function, v1.1
- changes the CSS "VS" texture to display NTSC or PAL based on the selected game mode
- changes CSS colors based on debug toggles
- v1.1 adds checks and updates for the special character icon textures. e.g. Sheik, wireframes, Master Hand, Giga Bowser, etc. (currently for VS. mode only)
[Achilles, DRGN]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -
NTSC 1.02 --- 0x80266974 ---- 906DB630 -> Branch

906DB630 3C608040
8063A300 2C030000
41820028 3C608000
606331F4 7C6903A6
3C8080FA 6084A2B0

	-==-


Hold X+A to Reset 20XX, v1.1
- hold X+A for 3 secs to trigger on the CSS or Debug Menu
- space for live flags reserved in DOL
- default 20XX flags are in MnSlChr --> make sure to update on version release
[Achilles, DRGN]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -
NTSC 1.02 --- 0x80266D5C ---- 8001001C -> bl <Reset20XXSettings>
------------- 0x80303FC0 ---- 8001001C -> bl <Reset20XXSettings>
<Reset20XXSettings> NTSC 1.02
7C0802A6 90010004
9421FF00 BE810008
480000AD 7C8802A6
80A40000 3C608048
80639CF4 70630500
2C030500 4082000C
38A50001 48000008
38A00000 90A40000
2C0500B4 41800074
38A00000 90A40000
38A00001 3C80804C
98A41FA3 38A00004
3C808043 90A43320
3C60803F 6063A174
3C8080FC 6084E730

bl 0x800031f4
3C60803F 6063A840
3C8080FC 6084EDFC
38A01420
bl 0x800031f4
3C608022 606388E0

3C608022 606389B0

80010104 38210100

4E800020


	-==-


Disable Name Tag and KO Star Reset After Closing Character Port
On the CSS, name tags normally switch back to the default character name after closing and reopening a port, and KO stars would also disappear. This mod prevents that.
[Ato]
Version -- DOL Offset ------ Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code
1.02 ----- 0x80261B1C --- 98A4007A -> 60000000
1.02 ----- 0x80261B30 --- 98A4001B -> 60000000
1.01 ----- 0x80261380 --- 98A4007A -> 60000000
1.01 ----- 0x80261394 --- 98A4001B -> 60000000
1.00 ----- 0x80260810 --- 98A4007A -> 60000000
1.00 ----- 0x80260824 --- 98A4001B -> 60000000
PAL ------ 0x802622C8 --- 98A4007A -> 60000000
PAL ------ 0x802622DC --- 98A4001B -> 60000000


	-==-


Disable Name Tag Reset After Exiting Character Select Screen
Also prevents KO counts from resetting.
[Todd Bonney]
Version -- DOL Offset ------ Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code
1.02 ----- 0x801A55EC --- 7C0802A6 -> 4E800020


	-==-


Extra Character Nametag Changes
Places character name strings for the Male/Female Wireframes (overwrites Japanese name strings).
ZAKA otoko -> M Wireframe
ZAKA onna -> F Wireframe
Also adds a string for "Ice Climber", and a pointer to it.
[Achilles, DRGN]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -
NTSC 1.02 ---- 0x3D1F7C -----

82798260826A826E20828F82

 -> 

# M Wireframe
4D20576972656672616D6500

-------------- 0x3D1F88 -----

94828F828B828F0082798260

 -> 

# Ice Climber
49636520436C696D62657200

-------------- 0x3D1F94 -----

826A826E20828F828E828E8281000000

 -> 

# F Wireframe
4620576972656672616D650000000000

-------------- 0x3D205C ----- 00000000 -> 803D4F88 # New pointer to "Ice Climber" string
-------------- 0x3D204F ----- 90 -> 94 # Modified pointer to F Wireframe


	-==-


Name Tag Blank Space Additions
Adds these characters: # | _
(includes unknown changes)
[Achilles]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -
NTSC 1.02 ---- 0x1a21d0 -----

386DB090 90010004 38800006 

 -> 

81940000 81620000 81510000

-------------- 0x3eac38 ----- 804D4CAC -> 801a55f0
-------------- 0x3eac4c ----- 804D4CAC -> 801a55f4
-------------- 0x3eac60 ----- 804D4CAC -> 801a55f8


	-==-


Display Time at Top Right of CSS 1.1
Only applies when the game rules are set to Stock.

1A1A1A1A 20002008
20E92004 20052019
20160000 8001001C
00000000

------------- 0x802288E0 ----

00000000

 -> 

# Debug Menu flag. Change last nibble to a 
# 1 to have this code enabled by default.
00000000


	-==-


! Causing problems on hardware

Unplugging Closes CSS Doors
There are two parts to this:
1) Unplugging a controller closes the respective CSS door
2) Unplugging the last controller closes all CSS doors

<https://github.com/UnclePunch/Training-Mode/blob/master/ASM/Additional%20Codes/Unplugging%20Closes%20CSS%20Door.asm>
<https://github.com/UnclePunch/Training-Mode/blob/master/ASM/Additional%20Codes/Last%20Unplug%20Closes%20All%20CSS%20Doors.asm>
[UnclePunch]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -
NTSC 1.02 --- 0x802605fc ---- 38C00001 -> 38C00003 # Unplugging Closes CSS Door
------------- 0x802605e4 ---- 881F0004 -> Branch

7C0802A6 90010004 # Last Unplug Closes All CSS Doors
9421FF00 BE810008
3C600000 60630144
38800000 1CA40044
7CA51A14 88A50041
7CA50775 4182004C
38840001 2C040004
4180FFE4 3FC00000
63DE0000 3BE00000
1C7F0024 7C63F214
38800003 98830000
7FE3FB78 3D800000
618C0000 7D8903A6
4E800421 3BFF0001
2C1F0004 4180FFD4
BA810008 80010104
38210100 7C0803A6
881F0004 48000000
